name: Library System
desc: The Library Management System simplifies library operations with efficient book and user management.

name: WorkConnect
desc: Work Connect is a platform designed to bridge professionals and opportunities, fostering seamless collaboration and efficient networking.

name: Login Page
desc: The Sign-In page provides users with secure access to their accounts, ensuring a seamless and personalized experience.

name: Fronted Project
desc: The Sign-Up page allows new users to create an account effortlessly, enabling access to personalized features and services.

name: Success Page
desc: The Success page confirms the completion of an action, ensuring users that their process was successful and acknowledged.

name: My Portfolio
desc: The Work Category section organizes and displays projects based on their specific types, making it easier for users to explore relevant work.
